column4: can you give me the line from this command: "grep -v '^#' /etc/sudoers |head -n 1" (without the double quotes and executed as root)?
can you give me the line from this command: "grep -v '^#' /etc/sudoers |head -n 1" (without the double quotes and executed as root)?
I just disabled my root account!
the command should only produce one line, so just paste it here or in a privmsg.
shift to single user mode and reenable it!

nothing...seems i just removed the passwd
